summary: While the gang travel to Scotland to visit Daphne's cousin and witness the Highland Games, they find themselves terrorized by the legendary Loch Ness Monster.
cast: Frank Welker|Casey Kasem|Mindy Cohn|Grey Griffin|Michael Bell|Jeff Bennett|John DiMaggio|Phil LaMarr|Sheena Easton
keywords: 2000s|cryptid|cryptozoology|animal character name in title|scooby doo character
title: Scooby-Doo and the Loch Ness Monster
